name: LööpBöund
description:
You are a little toy robot that landed in a bowl of milk and got stuck in a loop-shaped cereal piece. Surrounded by other potentially hostile cereal pieces, you must shoot your way through for survival, probably.

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Left-Click/Space: Shoot

Unfinished project made for Ludum Dare 47. Pretty much a tech demo. There is nothing past destroying all the cereal. I figured I might as well upload what I had so far.

LDJam Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/loops-3
